StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAddressHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @LeadID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT a.[Street1], a.[Street2], a.[CityID], a.[StateID], a.[ZipCode], a.[CountyID], a.[CountryID], swt.[Name] 'State Name', ci.es.Name 'City Name', coun.es.Name 'County Name', countries.Name 'Country Name', a.ChangeDate FROM addresshistory a LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[vwStatesWithTerritories] swt ON swt.Code = a.StateID LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[vwCi.es] ci.es ON ci.es.Code = a.CityID and ci.es.StateCode = a.StateID and ci.es.CountyCode = a.CountyID LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[vwCoun.es] coun.es ON coun.es.Code = a.CountyID and coun.es.StateCode = a.StateID LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[vwCountries] countries ON countries.Code = a.CountryID WHERE LeadID = @LeadID and (CountryID is null or CountryID = 'US' or (IsNumeric(CountryID) = 1))
UNION
SELECT a.[Street1], a.[Street2], a.[CityID], a.[StateID], a.[ZipCode], a.[CountyID], a.[CountryID], '' as 'State Name', ci.es.Name 'City Name', '' as 'County Name', countries.Name 'Country Name', a.ChangeDate FROM addresshistory a LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[vwCountries] countries ON countries.Code = a.CountryID LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[vwCi.es] ci.es ON ci.es.Code = a.CityID and ci.es.StateCode = a.CountryID
WHERE LeadID = @LeadID and CountryID <> 'US' AND (ISNUMERIC(CountryID) = 0) ORDER BY ChangeDate desc
